assignments.description: Adds the order product to the list of order products in the sObject collection variable.
assignments.name: Add_Order_Product_to_List
assignments.label: Add Order Product to List

assignments.description: Adds the order product to the list of order products in the sObject collection variable.
assignments.name: Add_Quote_LineItem_to_List
assignments.label: Add Quote LineItem to List

assignments.description:
Uses the quote’s or opportunity’s field values to assign field values to the order.
ACTION: Review the Order fields assigned and add/remove fields as needed.
If fields from another object are needed, you could add a Fast Lookup step prior to this step to read and store the fields in a separate sObject Variable to be used here.
assignments.name: Assign_Order_Fields
assignments.label: Assign Order Fields

assignments.description:
Uses the quote line item’s or order’s field values to assign field values to the order product.
ACTION: Review the order product fields assigned, and add or remove fields as needed.
If you need fields from another object, use a Fast Lookup element to store the fields in another sObject variable before this element in the flow, and then assign the stored values to the order product here.
assignments.name: Assign_Order_Product_Fields
assignments.label: Assign Order Product Fields

assignments.description:
Sets the order’s Status field to Activated.
Include this element if you want the new order to be Activated.
assignments.name: Set_Order_Status_to_Activated
assignments.label: Set Order Status to Activated

assignments.description: Sets the quote's Order Generated field to true.
assignments.name: Update_Order_Generated
assignments.label: Update Order Generated

decisions.description: Evaluates whether the sObject collection variable contains any order products.
decisions.name: Order_Product_List_Empty
decisions.label: Order Product List Empty?

decisions.description: Evaluates whether the sObject collection variable contains any order products.
decisions.name: QuoteLine_List_Empty
decisions.label: QuoteLine List Empty?

Flow.description: Include Validation: Quote Line Item without Depot Details; exclude validation: for BypassSupplierCompliance;
Flow.label: Quote to Order

loops.description: Iterates through each quote line item in the sObject collection variable.
loops.name: Loop_Quote_Lines
loops.label: Loop Quote Lines

recordCreates.description: Uses the field values that are stored in the sObject collection variable to create order products.
recordCreates.name: Create_Order_Products
recordCreates.label: Create Order Products

recordCreates.description: Uses the field values that are stored in the sObject collection variable to create order products.
recordCreates.name: Create_Quote_LineItems
recordCreates.label: Create Quote LineItems

recordLookups.name: Get_Quote_Line_Item_without_Depot
recordLookups.label: Get Quote Line Item without Depot

recordLookups.description:
Looks up the quote line items that are related to the quote, and stores selected field values for each quote line item in the sObject collection variable.
ACTION: Review the retrieved quote line item fields, and add additional fields as needed to the sObject collection variable.
recordLookups.name: Get_Quote_Lines
recordLookups.label: Get Quote Lines

recordUpdates.description:
Uses the field values that are stored in the sObject variable to update the order.
Include this element if you want the new order to be Activated.
recordUpdates.name: Activate_Order
recordUpdates.label: Activate Order

recordUpdates.description: Uses the field values that are stored in the sObject variable to update the quote.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Quote
recordUpdates.label: Update Quote

fields.name: Quote_Line_Item_without_Depot_Details
fields.fieldText: Quote Line Item without Depot Details (Invalid)

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
We cannot create Order Items because of: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}


System Administrator has been notified.
